snippet: Samuel Aranda had to slip into Yemen carefully as he covered last year's unrest. His patience was rewarded today when one of his images was chosen Photo of the Year by World Press Photo.
abstract: Samuel Aranda had to slip into Yemen carefully as he covered last year's unrest. His patience was rewarded today when one of his images was chosen Photo of the Year by World Press Photo.

byline.original: By KERRI MACDONALD and DAVID FURST

headline.main: A Painterly World Press Photo Winner
